v-model:show.description: Whether or not to display a pop-up layer

overlay.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

position.description: The pop-up position, the optional value is 'top', 'bottom', 'right' left
position.description_zh: 弹出位置，可选值为 `top` `bottom` `right` left

overlay-class.description: Customize the mask layer class name

duration.description: Animation duration, in seconds, is set to 0 to disable animation
duration.description_zh: 动画时长，单位秒，设置为 0 可以禁用动画

z-index.description: Set the z-index level of the pop-up to a fixed value
z-index.description_zh: 将弹窗的 z-index 层级设置为一个固定值

lock-scroll.description: Whether to lock the background scroll

lazy-render.description: Whether the node is rendered only when the elastic layer is displayed
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否在显示弹层时才渲染节点

close-on-popstate.description: Whether it is automatically closed when the page falls back
close-on-popstate.description_zh: 是否在页面回退时自动关闭

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to close when you click on the mask layer
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否在点击遮罩层后关闭

closeable.description: Whether or not to display the close icon

close-icon.description: Turn off the icon name or image link, which is equivalent to the [name attribute](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component.
close-icon.description_zh: 关闭图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

close-icon-position.description: Turn off the icon position, optional values are 'top-left' 'bottom-left' 'bottom-right'
close-icon-position.description_zh: 关闭图标位置，可选值为 `top-left` `bottom-left` `bottom-right`

before-close.description: The callback function before closing, returning 'false' to prevent closing, supports returning Promise
before-close.description_zh: 关闭前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可阻止关闭，支持返回 Promise

icon-prefix.description: Icon class name prefix, equivalent to the [class-prefix property](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props) of the Icon component
icon-prefix.description_zh: 图标类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

transition.description: The name of the animation class, which is equivalent to the 'name' property of [transition](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transition).
transition.description_zh: 动画类名，等价于 [transition](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#transition) 的 `name` 属性

transition-appear.description: Whether transition animations are enabled at initial rendering
transition-appear.description_zh: 是否在初始渲染时启用过渡动画

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on the pop-up layer

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when the mask layer is clicked

events.name: click-close-icon
events.description: Triggered when the close icon is clicked

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered immediately when the pop-up layer is opened
events.description_zh: 打开弹出层时立即触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered immediately when the pop-up layer is closed
events.description_zh: 关闭弹出层时立即触发

events.name: opened
events.description: Opens the pop-up layer and triggers after the animation ends
events.description_zh: 打开弹出层且动画结束后触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Turns off the pop-up layer and triggers after the animation ends
events.description_zh: 关闭弹出层且动画结束后触发

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the pop-up window

slots.name: overlay-content
slots.description: The contents of the mask layer
